description: This program generates an AFNI 3d+time data set based on user-specified signal and noise models for each voxel.

input_file.title: Input file
input_file.description: Filename of prototype 3d + time data file

in_tr_flag.title: In-TR Flag
in_tr_flag.description: Set the TR of the created timeseries to be the TR of the prototype dataset. The default is TR = 1.

signal_constr.title: Signal constraints
signal_constr.description: Constraints for kth signal parameter. Format: k c d where c <= gs[k] <= d

noise_constr.title: Noise constraints
noise_constr.description: Constraints for kth noise parameter. Format: k c d where c+b[k] <= gn[k] <= d+b[k]

sigma_value.title: Sigma value
sigma_value.description: Standard deviation of additive Gaussian noise

output_file.title: Output file
output_file.description: Filename of output 3d + time data file

signal_coef.title: Signal coefficient file
signal_coef.description: Write kth signal parameter gs[k]. Output 'fim' is written to prefix filename

noise_coef.title: Noise coefficient file
noise_coef.description: Write kth noise parameter gn[k]. Output 'fim' is written to prefix filename

bucket_config.title: Bucket configuration
bucket_config.description: Create one AFNI 'bucket' dataset containing n sub-bricks. n=0 creates the default output. Output 'bucket' is written to prefixname

brick_config.title: Brick configuration
brick_config.description: Specify content for sub-brick in the form 'm t k label' where m is the sub-brick number, t is 'scoef' or 'ncoef', k is parameter index, and label is a descriptive label.
